name: Japanese Pine
description:
This is an example game used for a teaching the teachers workshop as a "what you could make" by using GBStudio 2.0 and 3.0. It is a simple platformer that has quiz elements. It is very short and at max, should take less than half an hour to complete.

In Browser Keyboard settings:

WASD: Move

J: Interact/Jump

Rom/ Mobile Settings:

Up, Down, Left, Right: Move

A: Interact/Jump
